idea-plugin.name: Dashwave Cloud Build
idea-plugin.description:
Dashwave Cloud Build

Build and emulate your local Android codebase on Dashwave’s cloud build engine. Leverage the power of distributed caching to enhance build speeds and shareable emulation for quick bug reporting. Head over to dashwave.io to learn more.

Key Features:
  • All builds and emulation on cloud. Pre-setup configured environments. No dependency on local machine.
  • With Distributed Caching reuse cache artefacts generated across your entire team to maximise build speeds. Yes, you use the cache generated by your team members.
  • Share emulation as a public link with features to comment and collaborate.
  • Get build analytics like build speed and failures to optimise developer productivity.
How to use?
  1. Install the plugin in Android Studio.
  2. Open your android project and proceed with further setup instructions.
  3. Click on “Run Build on Dashwave” icon in the toolbar to start creating builds.
  4. Go to console to see the entire build history and analytics.
Further Instructions
  1. For creating signed builds refer to our documentation: Signed Build Configurations
  2. For wireless debugging on Dashwave’s engine refer here: Wireless Debugging
Support To raise a bug/complaint or any support join our community channel on Discord or write us at hello@dashwave.io
